enumeratedValues.name: STANDARD
enumeratedValues.description: Standard feature set.

enumeratedValues.name: MODEM
enumeratedValues.description: Standard feature set with MODEM/IrDA support.

enumeratedValues.name: NO_EFFECT
enumeratedValues.description: Module is not reset.

enumeratedValues.name: RESET
enumeratedValues.description: Module is reset.

enumeratedValues.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValues.description: Input trigger is disabled.

enumeratedValues.name: TRG_RXD
enumeratedValues.description: Input trigger is used instead of RXD pin input.

enumeratedValues.name: TRG_CTS
enumeratedValues.description: Input trigger is used instead of CTS_B pin input.

enumeratedValues.name: TRG_TXD
enumeratedValues.description: Input trigger is used to modulate the TXD pin output. The TXD pin output (after TXINV configuration) is internally ANDed with the input trigger.

enumeratedValues.name: ONE
enumeratedValues.description: One stop bit.

enumeratedValues.name: TWO
enumeratedValues.description: Two stop bits.

RXEDGIE.name: RXEDGIE
RXEDGIE.description: RX Input Active Edge Interrupt Enable

enumeratedValues.name: DISABLE
enumeratedValues.description: Hardware interrupts from STAT[RXEDGIF] are disabled.

enumeratedValues.name: ENABLE
enumeratedValues.description: Hardware interrupt is requested when STAT[RXEDGIF] flag is 1.

enumeratedValues.name: DISABLE
enumeratedValues.description: Hardware interrupts from STAT[LBKDIF] flag are disabled (use polling).

enumeratedValues.name: ENABLE
enumeratedValues.description: Hardware interrupt is requested when STAT[LBKDIF] flag is 1.

enumeratedValues.name: RESYNC
enumeratedValues.description: Resynchronization during received data word is supported.

enumeratedValues.name: NO_RESYNC
enumeratedValues.description: Resynchronization during received data word is disabled.

enumeratedValues.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValues.description: Receiver samples input data using the rising edge of the baud rate clock.

enumeratedValues.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValues.description: Receiver samples input data using the rising and falling edge of the baud rate clock.

enumeratedValues.name: ADDR_MATCH
enumeratedValues.description: Address Match Wakeup

enumeratedValues.name: IDLE_MATCH
enumeratedValues.description: Idle Match Wakeup

enumeratedValues.name: ONOFF_MATCH
enumeratedValues.description: Match On and Match Off

enumeratedValues.name: RWU_MATCH
enumeratedValues.description: Enables RWU on Data Match and Match On/Off for transmitter CTS input

enumeratedValues.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValues.description: DMA request disabled.

enumeratedValues.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValues.description: DMA request enabled.

enumeratedValues.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValues.description: DMA request disabled.

enumeratedValues.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValues.description: DMA request enabled.

enumeratedValues.name: DEFAULT
enumeratedValues.description: Writing 0 to this field results in an oversampling ratio of 16

enumeratedValues.name: OSR_4
enumeratedValues.description: Oversampling ratio of 4, requires BOTHEDGE to be set.

enumeratedValues.name: OSR_5
enumeratedValues.description: Oversampling ratio of 5, requires BOTHEDGE to be set.

enumeratedValues.name: OSR_6
enumeratedValues.description: Oversampling ratio of 6, requires BOTHEDGE to be set.

enumeratedValues.name: OSR_7
enumeratedValues.description: Oversampling ratio of 7, requires BOTHEDGE to be set.

enumeratedValues.name: OSR_8
enumeratedValues.description: Oversampling ratio of 8.

enumeratedValues.name: OSR_9
enumeratedValues.description: Oversampling ratio of 9.

enumeratedValues.name: OSR_10
enumeratedValues.description: Oversampling ratio of 10.

enumeratedValues.name: OSR_11
enumeratedValues.description: Oversampling ratio of 11.

enumeratedValues.name: OSR_12
enumeratedValues.description: Oversampling ratio of 12.

enumeratedValues.name: OSR_13
enumeratedValues.description: Oversampling ratio of 13.

enumeratedValues.name: OSR_14
enumeratedValues.description: Oversampling ratio of 14.

enumeratedValues.name: OSR_15
enumeratedValues.description: Oversampling ratio of 15.

enumeratedValues.name: OSR_16
enumeratedValues.description: Oversampling ratio of 16.

enumeratedValues.name: OSR_17
enumeratedValues.description: Oversampling ratio of 17.

enumeratedValues.name: OSR_18
enumeratedValues.description: Oversampling ratio of 18.

enumeratedValues.name: OSR_19
enumeratedValues.description: Oversampling ratio of 19.

enumeratedValues.name: OSR_20
enumeratedValues.description: Oversampling ratio of 20.

enumeratedValues.name: OSR_21
enumeratedValues.description: Oversampling ratio of 21.

enumeratedValues.name: OSR_22
enumeratedValues.description: Oversampling ratio of 22.

enumeratedValues.name: OSR_23
enumeratedValues.description: Oversampling ratio of 23.

enumeratedValues.name: OSR_24
enumeratedValues.description: Oversampling ratio of 24.

enumeratedValues.name: OSR_25
enumeratedValues.description: Oversampling ratio of 25.

enumeratedValues.name: OSR_26
enumeratedValues.description: Oversampling ratio of 26.

enumeratedValues.name: OSR_27
enumeratedValues.description: Oversampling ratio of 27.

enumeratedValues.name: OSR_28
enumeratedValues.description: Oversampling ratio of 28.

enumeratedValues.name: OSR_29
enumeratedValues.description: Oversampling ratio of 29.

enumeratedValues.name: OSR_30
enumeratedValues.description: Oversampling ratio of 30.

enumeratedValues.name: OSR_31
enumeratedValues.description: Oversampling ratio of 31.

enumeratedValues.name: OSR_32
enumeratedValues.description: Oversampling ratio of 32.

enumeratedValues.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValues.description: Receiver and transmitter use 7-bit to 9-bit data characters.

enumeratedValues.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValues.description: Receiver and transmitter use 10-bit data characters.

enumeratedValues.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValues.description: Normal operation.

enumeratedValues.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValues.description: Enables automatic address matching or data matching mode for MATCH[MA2].

enumeratedValues.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValues.description: Normal operation.

enumeratedValues.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValues.description: Enables automatic address matching or data matching mode for MATCH[MA1].

enumeratedValues.name: NOMATCH
enumeratedValues.description: Received data is not equal to MA2

enumeratedValues.name: MATCH
enumeratedValues.description: Received data is equal to MA2

enumeratedValues.name: NOMATCH
enumeratedValues.description: Received data is not equal to MA1

enumeratedValues.name: MATCH
enumeratedValues.description: Received data is equal to MA1

enumeratedValues.name: NOPARITY
enumeratedValues.description: No parity error.

enumeratedValues.name: PARITY
enumeratedValues.description: Parity error.

enumeratedValues.name: NOERROR
enumeratedValues.description: No framing error detected. This does not guarantee the framing is correct.

enumeratedValues.name: ERROR
enumeratedValues.description: Framing error.

enumeratedValues.name: NONOISE
enumeratedValues.description: No noise detected.

enumeratedValues.name: NOISE
enumeratedValues.description: Noise detected in the received character in the DATA register.

enumeratedValues.name: NO_OVERRUN
enumeratedValues.description: No overrun.

enumeratedValues.name: OVERRUN
enumeratedValues.description: Receive overrun (new LPUART data lost).

enumeratedValues.name: NOIDLE
enumeratedValues.description: No idle line detected.

enumeratedValues.name: IDLE
enumeratedValues.description: Idle line is detected.

enumeratedValues.name: NO_RXDATA
enumeratedValues.description: Receive FIFO level is less than watermark.

enumeratedValues.name: RXDATA
enumeratedValues.description: Receive FIFO level is equal or greater than watermark.

enumeratedValues.name: ACTIVE
enumeratedValues.description: Transmitter active (sending data, a preamble, or a break).

enumeratedValues.name: COMPLETE
enumeratedValues.description: Transmitter idle (transmission activity complete).

enumeratedValues.name: TXDATA
enumeratedValues.description: Transmit FIFO level is greater than watermark.

enumeratedValues.name: NO_TXDATA
enumeratedValues.description: Transmit FIFO level is equal or less than watermark.

enumeratedValues.name: IDLE
enumeratedValues.description: LPUART receiver idle waiting for a start bit.

enumeratedValues.name: ACTIVE
enumeratedValues.description: LPUART receiver active (RXD input not idle).

enumeratedValues.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValues.description: LIN break detect is disabled, normal break character can be detected.

enumeratedValues.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValues.description: LIN break detect is enabled. LIN break character is detected at length of 11 bit times (if M = 0) or 12 (if M = 1) or 13 (M10 = 1).

enumeratedValues.name: SHORT
enumeratedValues.description: Break character is transmitted with length of 9 to 13 bit times.

enumeratedValues.name: LONG
enumeratedValues.description: Break character is transmitted with length of 12 to 15 bit times.

enumeratedValues.name: IDLE_NOTSET
enumeratedValues.description: During receive standby state (RWU = 1), the IDLE bit does not get set upon detection of an idle character. During address match wakeup, the IDLE bit does not set when an address does not match.

enumeratedValues.name: IDLE_SET
enumeratedValues.description: During receive standby state (RWU = 1), the IDLE bit gets set upon detection of an idle character. During address match wakeup, the IDLE bit does set when an address does not match.

enumeratedValues.name: NOT_INVERTED
enumeratedValues.description: Receive data not inverted.

enumeratedValues.name: INVERTED
enumeratedValues.description: Receive data inverted.

enumeratedValues.name: LSB_FIRST
enumeratedValues.description: LSB (bit0) is the first bit that is transmitted following the start bit. Further, the first bit received after the start bit is identified as bit0.

enumeratedValues.name: MSB_FIRST
enumeratedValues.description: MSB (identified as bit9, bit8, bit7 or bit6) is the first bit that is transmitted following the start bit depending on the setting of CTRL[M], CTRL[PE] and BAUD[M10]. .

RXEDGIF.name: RXEDGIF
RXEDGIF.description: RXD Pin Active Edge Interrupt Flag

enumeratedValues.name: NO_EDGE
enumeratedValues.description: No active edge on the receive pin has occurred.

enumeratedValues.name: EDGE
enumeratedValues.description: An active edge on the receive pin has occurred.

enumeratedValues.name: NOT_DETECTED
enumeratedValues.description: No LIN break character has been detected.

enumeratedValues.name: DETECTED
enumeratedValues.description: LIN break character has been detected.

enumeratedValues.name: EVEN
enumeratedValues.description: Even parity.

enumeratedValues.name: ODD
enumeratedValues.description: Odd parity.

enumeratedValues.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValues.description: No hardware parity generation or checking.

enumeratedValues.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValues.description: Parity enabled.

enumeratedValues.name: FROM_START
enumeratedValues.description: Idle character bit count starts after start bit.

enumeratedValues.name: FROM_STOP
enumeratedValues.description: Idle character bit count starts after stop bit.

enumeratedValues.name: IDLE
enumeratedValues.description: Configures RWU for idle-line wakeup.

enumeratedValues.name: MARK
enumeratedValues.description: Configures RWU with address-mark wakeup.

enumeratedValues.name: DATA8
enumeratedValues.description: Receiver and transmitter use 8-bit data characters.

enumeratedValues.name: DATA9
enumeratedValues.description: Receiver and transmitter use 9-bit data characters.

enumeratedValues.name: NO_EFFECT
enumeratedValues.description: Provided LOOPS is set, RSRC is cleared, selects internal loop back mode and the LPUART does not use the RXD pin.

enumeratedValues.name: ONEWIRE
enumeratedValues.description: Single-wire LPUART mode where the TXD pin is connected to the transmitter output and receiver input.

enumeratedValues.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValues.description: LPUART is enabled in Doze mode.

enumeratedValues.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValues.description: LPUART is disabled in Doze mode .

enumeratedValues.name: NOFFECT
enumeratedValues.description: Normal operation - RXD and TXD use separate pins.

enumeratedValues.name: LOOPBACK
enumeratedValues.description: Loop mode or single-wire mode where transmitter outputs are internally connected to receiver input (see RSRC bit).

enumeratedValues.name: IDLE_1
enumeratedValues.description: 1 idle character

enumeratedValues.name: IDLE_2
enumeratedValues.description: 2 idle characters

enumeratedValues.name: IDLE_4
enumeratedValues.description: 4 idle characters

enumeratedValues.name: IDLE_8
enumeratedValues.description: 8 idle characters

enumeratedValues.name: IDLE_16
enumeratedValues.description: 16 idle characters

enumeratedValues.name: IDLE_32
enumeratedValues.description: 32 idle characters

enumeratedValues.name: IDLE_64
enumeratedValues.description: 64 idle characters

enumeratedValues.name: IDLE_128
enumeratedValues.description: 128 idle characters

enumeratedValues.name: NO_EFFECT
enumeratedValues.description: Receiver and transmitter use 8-bit to 10-bit data characters.

enumeratedValues.name: DATA7
enumeratedValues.description: Receiver and transmitter use 7-bit data characters.

enumeratedValues.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValues.description: MA2F interrupt disabled

enumeratedValues.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValues.description: MA2F interrupt enabled

enumeratedValues.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValues.description: MA1F interrupt disabled

enumeratedValues.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValues.description: MA1F interrupt enabled

enumeratedValues.name: NO_EFFECT
enumeratedValues.description: Normal transmitter operation.

enumeratedValues.name: TX_BREAK
enumeratedValues.description: Queue break character(s) to be sent.

enumeratedValues.name: NO_EFFECT
enumeratedValues.description: Normal receiver operation.

enumeratedValues.name: RX_WAKEUP
enumeratedValues.description: LPUART receiver in standby waiting for wakeup condition.

enumeratedValues.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValues.description: Receiver disabled.

enumeratedValues.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValues.description: Receiver enabled.

enumeratedValues.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValues.description: Transmitter disabled.

enumeratedValues.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValues.description: Transmitter enabled.

enumeratedValues.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValues.description: Hardware interrupts from IDLE disabled; use polling.

enumeratedValues.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValues.description: Hardware interrupt is requested when IDLE flag is 1.

enumeratedValues.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValues.description: Hardware interrupts from RDRF disabled.

enumeratedValues.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValues.description: Hardware interrupt is requested when RDRF flag is 1.

enumeratedValues.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValues.description: Hardware interrupts from TC disabled.

enumeratedValues.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValues.description: Hardware interrupt is requested when TC flag is 1.

enumeratedValues.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValues.description: Hardware interrupts from TDRE disabled.

enumeratedValues.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValues.description: Hardware interrupt is requested when TDRE flag is 1.

enumeratedValues.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValues.description: PF interrupts disabled; use polling).

enumeratedValues.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValues.description: Hardware interrupt is requested when PF is set.

enumeratedValues.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValues.description: FE interrupts disabled; use polling.

enumeratedValues.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValues.description: Hardware interrupt is requested when FE is set.

enumeratedValues.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValues.description: NF interrupts disabled; use polling.

enumeratedValues.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValues.description: Hardware interrupt is requested when NF is set.

enumeratedValues.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValues.description: OR interrupts disabled; use polling.

enumeratedValues.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValues.description: Hardware interrupt is requested when OR is set.

enumeratedValues.name: NOT_INVERTED
enumeratedValues.description: Transmit data not inverted.

enumeratedValues.name: INVERTED
enumeratedValues.description: Transmit data inverted.

TXDIR.name: TXDIR
TXDIR.description: TXD Pin Direction in Single-Wire Mode

enumeratedValues.name: TX_INPUT
enumeratedValues.description: TXD pin is an input in single-wire mode.

enumeratedValues.name: TX_OUTPUT
enumeratedValues.description: TXD pin is an output in single-wire mode.

enumeratedValues.name: NO_IDLE
enumeratedValues.description: Receiver was not idle before receiving this character.

enumeratedValues.name: IDLE
enumeratedValues.description: Receiver was idle before receiving this character.

enumeratedValues.name: NOT_EMPTY
enumeratedValues.description: Receive buffer contains valid data.

enumeratedValues.name: EMPTY
enumeratedValues.description: Receive buffer is empty, data returned on read is not valid.

enumeratedValues.name: NO_ERROR
enumeratedValues.description: The dataword is received without a frame error on read, or transmit a normal character on write.

enumeratedValues.name: ERROR
enumeratedValues.description: The dataword is received with a frame error, or transmit an idle or break character on transmit.

enumeratedValues.name: NO_PARITY
enumeratedValues.description: The dataword is received without a parity error.

enumeratedValues.name: PARITY
enumeratedValues.description: The dataword is received with a parity error.

enumeratedValues.name: NO_NOISE
enumeratedValues.description: The dataword is received without noise.

enumeratedValues.name: NOISE
enumeratedValues.description: The data is received with noise.

enumeratedValues.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValues.description: CTS has no effect on the transmitter.

enumeratedValues.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValues.description: Enables clear-to-send operation. The transmitter checks the state of CTS each time it is ready to send a character. If CTS is asserted, the character is sent. If CTS is deasserted, the signal TXD remains in the mark state and transmission is delayed until CTS is asserted. Changes in CTS as a character is being sent do not affect its transmission.

enumeratedValues.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValues.description: The transmitter has no effect on RTS.

enumeratedValues.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValues.description: When a character is placed into an empty transmit shift register, RTS asserts one bit time before the start bit is transmitted. RTS deasserts one bit time after all characters in the transmitter FIFO and shift register are completely sent, including the last stop bit.

enumeratedValues.name: LOW
enumeratedValues.description: Transmitter RTS is active low.

enumeratedValues.name: HIGH
enumeratedValues.description: Transmitter RTS is active high.

enumeratedValues.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValues.description: The receiver has no effect on RTS.

enumeratedValues.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValues.description: RTS is deasserted if the receiver data register is full or a start bit has been detected that would cause the receiver data register to become full. RTS is asserted if the receiver data register is not full and has not detected a start bit that would cause the receiver data register to become full.

enumeratedValues.name: START
enumeratedValues.description: CTS input is sampled at the start of each character.

enumeratedValues.name: IDLE
enumeratedValues.description: CTS input is sampled when the transmitter is idle.

enumeratedValues.name: CTS
enumeratedValues.description: CTS input is the CTS_B pin.

enumeratedValues.name: MATCH
enumeratedValues.description: CTS input is an internal connection to the receiver address match result.

enumeratedValues.name: ONE_SAMPLE
enumeratedValues.description: 1/OSR.

enumeratedValues.name: TWO_SAMPLE
enumeratedValues.description: 2/OSR.

enumeratedValues.name: THREE_SAMPLE
enumeratedValues.description: 3/OSR.

enumeratedValues.name: FOUR_SAMPLE
enumeratedValues.description: 4/OSR.

enumeratedValues.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValues.description: IR disabled.

enumeratedValues.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValues.description: IR enabled.

enumeratedValues.name: FIFO_1
enumeratedValues.description: Receive FIFO/Buffer depth = 1 dataword.

enumeratedValues.name: FIFO_4
enumeratedValues.description: Receive FIFO/Buffer depth = 4 datawords.

enumeratedValues.name: FIFO_8
enumeratedValues.description: Receive FIFO/Buffer depth = 8 datawords.

enumeratedValues.name: FIFO_16
enumeratedValues.description: Receive FIFO/Buffer depth = 16 datawords.

enumeratedValues.name: FIFO_32
enumeratedValues.description: Receive FIFO/Buffer depth = 32 datawords.

enumeratedValues.name: FIFO_64
enumeratedValues.description: Receive FIFO/Buffer depth = 64 datawords.

enumeratedValues.name: FIFO_128
enumeratedValues.description: Receive FIFO/Buffer depth = 128 datawords.

enumeratedValues.name: FIFO_256
enumeratedValues.description: Receive FIFO/Buffer depth = 256 datawords.

enumeratedValues.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValues.description: Receive FIFO is not enabled. Buffer depth is 1.

enumeratedValues.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValues.description: Receive FIFO is enabled. Buffer depth is indicted by RXFIFOSIZE.

enumeratedValues.name: FIFO_1
enumeratedValues.description: Transmit FIFO/Buffer depth = 1 dataword.

enumeratedValues.name: FIFO_4
enumeratedValues.description: Transmit FIFO/Buffer depth = 4 datawords.

enumeratedValues.name: FIFO_8
enumeratedValues.description: Transmit FIFO/Buffer depth = 8 datawords.

enumeratedValues.name: FIFO_16
enumeratedValues.description: Transmit FIFO/Buffer depth = 16 datawords.

enumeratedValues.name: FIFO_32
enumeratedValues.description: Transmit FIFO/Buffer depth = 32 datawords.

enumeratedValues.name: FIFO_64
enumeratedValues.description: Transmit FIFO/Buffer depth = 64 datawords.

enumeratedValues.name: FIFO_128
enumeratedValues.description: Transmit FIFO/Buffer depth = 128 datawords.

enumeratedValues.name: FIFO_256
enumeratedValues.description: Transmit FIFO/Buffer depth = 256 datawords

enumeratedValues.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValues.description: Transmit FIFO is not enabled. Buffer depth is 1.

enumeratedValues.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValues.description: Transmit FIFO is enabled. Buffer depth is indicated by TXFIFOSIZE.

enumeratedValues.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValues.description: RXUF flag does not generate an interrupt to the host.

enumeratedValues.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValues.description: RXUF flag generates an interrupt to the host.

enumeratedValues.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValues.description: TXOF flag does not generate an interrupt to the host.

enumeratedValues.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValues.description: TXOF flag generates an interrupt to the host.

enumeratedValues.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValues.description: Disable RDRF assertion due to partially filled FIFO when receiver is idle.

enumeratedValues.name: IDLE_1
enumeratedValues.description: Enable RDRF assertion due to partially filled FIFO when receiver is idle for 1 character.

enumeratedValues.name: IDLE_2
enumeratedValues.description: Enable RDRF assertion due to partially filled FIFO when receiver is idle for 2 characters.

enumeratedValues.name: IDLE_4
enumeratedValues.description: Enable RDRF assertion due to partially filled FIFO when receiver is idle for 4 characters.

enumeratedValues.name: IDLE_8
enumeratedValues.description: Enable RDRF assertion due to partially filled FIFO when receiver is idle for 8 characters.

enumeratedValues.name: IDLE_16
enumeratedValues.description: Enable RDRF assertion due to partially filled FIFO when receiver is idle for 16 characters.

enumeratedValues.name: IDLE_32
enumeratedValues.description: Enable RDRF assertion due to partially filled FIFO when receiver is idle for 32 characters.

enumeratedValues.name: IDLE_64
enumeratedValues.description: Enable RDRF assertion due to partially filled FIFO when receiver is idle for 64 characters.

enumeratedValues.name: NO_EFFECT
enumeratedValues.description: No flush operation occurs.

enumeratedValues.name: RXFIFO_RST
enumeratedValues.description: All data in the receive FIFO/buffer is cleared out.

enumeratedValues.name: NO_EFFECT
enumeratedValues.description: No flush operation occurs.

enumeratedValues.name: TXFIFO_RST
enumeratedValues.description: All data in the transmit FIFO is cleared out.

enumeratedValues.name: NO_UNDERFLOW
enumeratedValues.description: No receive FIFO underflow has occurred since the last time the flag was cleared.

enumeratedValues.name: UNDERFLOW
enumeratedValues.description: At least one receive FIFO underflow has occurred since the last time the flag was cleared.

enumeratedValues.name: NO_OVERFLOW
enumeratedValues.description: No transmit FIFO overflow has occurred since the last time the flag was cleared.

enumeratedValues.name: OVERFLOW
enumeratedValues.description: At least one transmit FIFO overflow has occurred since the last time the flag was cleared.

enumeratedValues.name: NOT_EMPTY
enumeratedValues.description: Receive buffer is not empty.

enumeratedValues.name: EMPTY
enumeratedValues.description: Receive buffer is empty.

enumeratedValues.name: NOT_EMPTY
enumeratedValues.description: Transmit buffer is not empty.

enumeratedValues.name: EMPTY
enumeratedValues.description: Transmit buffer is empty.
